si.title: නුවර එලියා දිස්ත්රික් කොත්මලයි මැතිවරණ මැතිවරණය

en.title: Nuwara Eliya District Kothmalai Election constituency

summary_lines: Nuwara Eliya District Kothmalai Election constituency summary: A parliamentary constituency located in central Sri Lanka. It covers parts of Nuwara Eliya District and is known for its tea plantations and scenic beauty. The area has a mix of urban and rural populations, influencing local politics and development priorities.
